title: Movie Recommendation System
description: A content-based movie recommendation engine that analyzes user preferences and viewing history to suggest personalized movie recommendations with high accuracy.

title: Ecommerce using Django
description: A fully functional e-commerce platform with features including product catalog, shopping cart, secure payment integration, user authentication, and order management system.

title: Job-Portal using Django
description: A comprehensive job portal that connects employers and job seekers, featuring job listings, advanced search filters, application tracking, and user profile management.

title: Open-AI Assistant
description: A conversational AI assistant built on OpenAI's API that provides contextual responses, performs tasks, and integrates with various services to enhance user productivity.

title: Rentalescapes
description: An automated real estate data collection system that scrapes multiple property listing websites to aggregate rental properties with detailed information and analytics.
